judge_outputs.raw: {"aspect_votes": {"inquiry_quality": "B", "persona_adaptation": "B", "methodology_critique": "B", "plan_completeness": "B", "literature_quality": "B", "actionability_risks": "B", "guideline_adherence": "B"}, "winner": "B", "justification": "System B is better because it provides more concrete and actionable advice, with a more detailed plan and a wider range of experiment ideas. System A's plan is too short and its experiments are less well-defined. System B also does a better job of adapting to the persona by focusing on practical, less math-intensive aspects of AI research."}

parsed.justification: System B is better because it provides more concrete and actionable advice, with a more detailed plan and a wider range of experiment ideas. System A's plan is too short and its experiments are less well-defined. System B also does a better job of adapting to the persona by focusing on practical, less math-intensive aspects of AI research.
